name: Lakeland Financial Corporation
description: Lakeland Financial Corporation is a financial services holding company headquartered in Warsaw, Indiana. Founded in 1872, the company primarily operates through its wholly-owned subsidiary, Lakeland Bank, which provides a range of banking and financial services to individuals and businesses. Lakeland Bank offers traditional banking products such as checking and savings accounts, personal and business loans, mortgages, and investment services. The bank is known for its community-focused approach, emphasizing personalized service and local involvement. With a commitment to innovation, Lakeland Financial has also embraced digital banking solutions, allowing customers to manage their finances conveniently through online and mobile platforms. The company aims to foster economic growth in its communities by providing financial support and resources to local businesses. Additionally, Lakeland Financial Corporation is committed to maintaining strong regulatory compliance and risk management practices to ensure the safety and soundness of its operations. With a rich history and a forward-looking vision, Lakeland Financial continues to build strong relationships with its customers and enhance its service offerings to meet the evolving needs of the communities it serves.

seo.meta_title: Lakeland Financial Corporation | Banking and Financial Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Lakeland Financial Corporation, a trusted provider of banking and financial services. Discover our commitment to community and customer service.

faq.question: What services does Lakeland Financial Corporation offer?
faq.answer: Lakeland Financial Corporation offers a variety of banking and financial services, including checking and savings accounts, loans, and investment services.

faq.question: Where is Lakeland Financial headquartered?
faq.answer: Lakeland Financial is headquartered in Warsaw, Indiana, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Lakeland Financial Corporation?
faq.answer: David M. Findlay is the CEO of Lakeland Financial Corporation.

faq.question: When was Lakeland Financial Corporation founded?
faq.answer: Lakeland Financial Corporation was founded in 1872.
